comments:
There are several problem with the new Team Project Set wizards

1) Non transparent icon - the icon for the wizard has a white background which 
does not blend with OSs with non white list backgrounds (like Linux)

2) Confusing progress monitor (Linux). The progress monitor on the import never 
updates the text so if you lose focus by putting a window over top you have no 
idea what is going on. It also resets the monitor constantly and there is a 
long period with an empty progress stream. Suggest using sub progress monitors 
and updating a main monitor as the operations progress

3) Internal Error exporting (see error below) - win 2000
   I selected org.eclipse.ui and exported to a file called chacha (not 
extension) and got the following exception

java.lang.NullPointerException

Other issues:

Also there is inconsistent casing on the words Team Project Set in the dialog - 
there are three different permutations of capitalization.

Browse dialog uses open rather than save for export.

List should have a border if not scroll bars

Missing mnemonics on the button and both lists

1) What icon are you referring to? I'm running Linux and the icons look fine to
me on a grey background.
The main icon in the dialog top left.

Fixed all.

I have put code in that guards against a null provider (cause of the walkback
below), but I do not know what caused that situation in the first place. If you
have repeatable steps we can take, we should open a separate bug, as it is
unrelated to the project set work.

Released changes.
